page.title: 04SALMONHUTCH AND UTON
page.content: Salmonhutch is also the site of Crediton Fly Fishing club.You have to be 11 years old to join and if you want to keep any fish caught they must be 25cm long or more.On 2nd June 125 Brown Trout were used to stock the Creedy and Yeo.The fish were all 2 years old and about 20cm long. We then walked up to Uton hamlet. There weren't any shops or anything, just a phone box and a post box.There were only eleven houses in Uton and 4 of them were thatched.We found a small entrance by the road side,it turned out to be the site of an old well (Ladywell).We think it used to be someone's back garden-as there were parts that had been looked after with garden flowers growing.It was now very boggy and overgrown,the water seeping out of the well had turned stagnant. Leigh nearly fell in!
